record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Change update" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: You can update a Change request to add information.
You can assign a new category to the Change request, update and defer the request, or update and open the request.
To update the Change request selected, press F2 (Update).

detail.detail: Change Management displays a page that includes the update option keys.
Proceed with the update by modifying the appropriate information and using one of the update options; Update, Update and Defer, or Update and Open.
Update and Defer: Gives the Change request a status of Deferred.
Use this option to place the Change request on hold for a period of time.
Update and Open: Gives the Change request a status of Updated-Opened.
Use this option for when opening Change requests that were Deferred or Closed.
